description:
Shiinotic is a dual-type Grass/Fairy Pokémon.
It evolves from Morelull starting at level 24.
Shiinotic is a large white Pokémon that resembles a mushroom. It has large, black eyes with pale green half-circle markings on the outer side. It has long, thin arms that splits into three pale green roots. It has small, light pink bumps on its lower body. At the top of its head is a large purple mushroom with pale green oval markings. Unlike its pre-evolution, it has a mouth. It is a medium-sized black mouth.
It emits strange lights that confuse people that enter the forest that it inhabits, making sure they can never find their way home again. Its flickering spores cause drowsiness. This Pokémon takes advantage when its prey is asleep to feed on them by sucking in their energy.
name: Masheedo
